articles.title: Porsche unveils CarPlay-compatible radios for its classic cars - The Verge
articles.description: Porsche introduces two new head units for its classic vehicles, with high-res touchscreens, DAB+, Bluetooth, and Apple CarPlay.
articles.content:
Porsche is introducing new head units that combine vintage design with more modern conveniences, like high-resolution touchscreens, Bluetooth, DAB+, and Apple CarPlay. 
There are two versions available: one with single-DIN dimensions and a 3.5-inch display f… [+1450 chars]

articles.description: The new Malwarebytes Privacy VPN has been launched at a time VPN adoption is likely on the rise.
